quotes.quote: Chess is the struggle against one's own errors.
quotes.author: Johannes Zukertort

quotes.quote: Chess is mental torture.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Chess is a sea in which a gnat may drink and an elephant may bathe.
quotes.author: Indian proverb

quotes.quote: Chess is war over the board. The object is to crush the opponent's mind.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess is played with the mind and not with the hands!
quotes.author: Renaud and Kahn

quotes.quote: Chess is the art which expresses the science of logic.
quotes.author: Mikhail Botvinnik

quotes.quote: Chess is life in miniature. Chess is a struggle, chess battles.
quotes.author: Gary Kasparov

quotes.quote: Every move counts.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: The winner of the game is the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: The beauty of a move lies not in its appearance but in the thought behind it.
quotes.author: Aaron Nimzowitsch

quotes.quote: You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win. You will have to lose hundreds of games before becoming a good player.
quotes.author: José Capablanca

quotes.quote: Chess is like life.
quotes.author: Boris Spassky

quotes.quote: A sacrifice is best refuted by accepting it.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: It is not enough to be a good player, you must also play well.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.quote: The combination player thinks forward; he starts from the given position, and tries the forceful moves in his mind.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: The hardest game to win is a won game.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: Chess holds its master in its own bonds, shackling the mind and brain so that the inner freedom of the very strongest must suffer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The game of chess is not merely an idle amusement. Several very valuable qualities of the mind, useful in the course of human life, are to be acquired and strengthened by it… Life is a kind of Chess.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Chess is really the test of the human spirit.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: In chess, as in life, a man has only one chance to be lucky.
quotes.author: Mikhail Tal

quotes.quote: There is no remorse like the remorse of chess.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: Chess is a sport. A violent sport.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.quote: Tactics flow from a superior position.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Success in chess is based on character. Weak character cannot sustain a great talent.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Errors are there to be corrected; not to be lamented over.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.quote: I have discovered the concentrated essence of the joy of chess.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: The beauty of chess is only visible in the mind.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.quote: Chess is ruthless: you've got to be prepared to kill people.
quotes.author: Nigel Short

quotes.quote: The pawns are the soul of chess.
quotes.author: Philidor

quotes.quote: The essence of chess is thinking about what chess is.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: Every chess master was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Irving Chernev

quotes.quote: All that matters on the chessboard is good moves.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Every chess move is like a question.
quotes.author: Richard Reti

quotes.quote: If your opponent offers you a draw, try to work out why he thinks he's worse off.
quotes.author: Nigel Short

quotes.quote: You don’t have to play well, just better than your opponent.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.quote: The king is a fighting piece. Use it!
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: All chess masters can play ‘blindfold.’
quotes.author: George Koltanowski

quotes.quote: Adequate compensation for a sacrifice is having a sound combination leading to a winning position.
quotes.author: Bruce A. Moon

quotes.quote: The blunders are all there on the board, waiting to be made.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: The tactician must know what to do whenever something needs doing; the strategist must know what to do when nothing needs doing.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: A chess game is divided into three stages: the first, when you hope you have the advantage, the second when you believe you have an advantage, and the third when you know you’re going to lose!
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: He who takes the queen’s knight’s pawn will sleep in the streets.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Chess is an open book and we must be prepared for every possibility.
quotes.author: Modest S. Mussorgsky

quotes.quote: Only the player with the initiative has the right to attack.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: It’s always better to sacrifice your opponent’s men.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: A man who has once begun to play chess, if he has any talent for it, never leaves it. He will have a way of taking it up again at the first opportunity.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.quote: When you are lonely, when you feel yourself an alien in the world, play chess. This will raise your spirits and be your counselor in war.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Chess is a matter of delicate judgment, knowing when to punch and how to duck.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess is a game that simulates war, and not a war itself.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess is a mixture of art, science, and sport.
quotes.author: Kirsan Ilyumzhinov

quotes.quote: The older I grow, the more I value pawns.
quotes.author: Keres

quotes.quote: The blunders are all there on the board, waiting to be made.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: Chess is a unique cognitive nexus, a place where art and science come together in the human mind and are refined and improved by experience.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Let the beauty of chess emerge out of the struggle.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Of Chess it has been said that life is not long enough for it, but that is the fault of life, not Chess.
quotes.author: William Ewart Napier

quotes.quote: Chess is ruthless: you've got to be prepared to kill people.
quotes.author: Nigel Short

quotes.quote: Tactics flow from a superior position.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: To avoid losing a piece, many a person has lost the game.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon in chess is to have the next move.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: In Chess, just as in life, today’s bliss may be tomorrow’s poison. It is essential not to be upset by injustice, nor to let your opponent’s success go to your head. If you follow this advice, then again, it is a prerequisite for conducting a successful defense.
quotes.author: Tigran Petrosian

quotes.quote: The Pin is mightier than the sword.
quotes.author: Fred Reinfeld

quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Chess appeared to me like a sea in which there was as much pleasure to be found as in a sea of ideas.
